aws:cdk:cloudformation:props.emailVerificationMessage: The verification code to your new account is {####}
aws:cdk:cloudformation:props.smsVerificationMessage: The verification code to your new account is {####}

verificationMessageTemplate.emailMessage: The verification code to your new account is {####}
verificationMessageTemplate.smsMessage: The verification code to your new account is {####}

Fn::Join: Default Authenticated Role for Identity Pool
Default Unauthenticated Role for Identity Pool

aws:cdk:cloudformation:props.description: Role assumed by Amplify Hosting for deploying aws cdk

aws:cdk:cloudformation:props.buildSpec:
version: 1
frontend:
  phases:
    preBuild:
      commands:
        - cd _backend
        - npm ci
        - npm run codegen
        - npm run build:resolvers
        - npx aws-cdk deploy --require-approval never --outputs-file ../output.json
        - cd ..
        - npm ci
    build:
      commands:
        - npm run build
  artifacts:
    baseDirectory: .next
    files:
      - "**/*"
  cache:
    paths:
      - node_modules/**/*
aws:cdk:cloudformation:props.name: appsync-amplify-cdk-next-prod
